definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
asylum/shelter/to shield/to put under protection/to take under one's wing
to give shade (of a tree etc)/to shield
to rely on sb for protection
Kota Kinabalu (capital of Sabah state, Malaysia)
Scipio Africanus (235-183 BC), Roman general and statesman
to bless/to protect/protection (esp. divine)/also written 庇佑[bi4 you4]
Pisistratus (-528 BC), tyrant (ruler) of Athens at different times between 561 BC and 528 BC
Euripides (c. 480-406 BC), Greek tragedian, author of Medea, Trojan Women etc
Robespierre (name)/Maximilien François Marie Isidore de Robespierre (1758-1794), French revolutionary leader, enthusiastic advocate of reign of terror 1791-1794

sentences.english: Isaac meanwhile had moved on as far as Beer-lahai-roi and was living in the Negeb.
sentences.chinese: 以撒此时已搬到老远的庇耳拉海莱，住在耐格伯。

sentences.english: Orbiting spacecraft have shown a huge mountain on Mars called Olympus Mons.
sentences.chinese: 轨道飞船显示了火星上的大山，叫奥林庇斯山。

sentences.english: What, O Trismegistus, are the primordial principles of things?
sentences.chinese: 哦，阿斯克勒庇俄斯，事物的原始法则是什幺？

sentences.english: Some 7 pieces of big and small mobile gen-sets were seen in the Kota Kinabalu storage yard.
sentences.chinese: 目前大约有七部的流动发电机在亚庇的场地。

sentences.english: Why do economists prefer them over regulations as a way to protect the environment from pollution?
sentences.chinese: 为何经济学家喜欢用庇古税而不用管治方法保护环境？

sentences.english: And Isaac came from the way of the well Lahairoi; for he dwelt in the south country.
sentences.chinese: 那时，以撒住在南地，刚从庇耳拉海莱回来。

sentences.english: Then, I got up and ran to the shelter at full speed.
sentences.chinese: 然后，我爬起来以最快的速度向庇难所跑去。

sentences.english: What is the reason of this, O Trismegistus?
sentences.chinese: 哦，阿斯克勒庇俄斯，这个原因是什么？

sentences.english: Lepidus shrugged his shoulders, but was too languid to reply .
sentences.chinese: 勒庇多斯耸耸肩膀，但是懒得回答。

definition: archaic variant of 蘇|苏[su1]/to revive
full up/classifier for items of clothing (old)
